mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM history h INNER JOIN task t ON h.task_no = t.task_no INNER JOIN project_member pm ON t.project_no = pm.project_no INNER JOIN project p ON t.project_no = p.project_no WHERE pm.member_no = #{member_no}

SELECT h.history_content, h.task_no, h.history_register_date, p.project_title, pm.member_no, p.project_no, t.task_title, m.name as name FROM history h INNER JOIN task t ON h.task_no = t.task_no INNER JOIN project_member pm ON t.project_no = pm.project_no INNER JOIN project p ON t.project_no = p.project_no INNER JOIN member m ON t.member_no = m.member_no WHERE pm.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY h.history_no DESC LIMIT #{startNo}, #{endNo}
SELECT p.project_title, p.project_no, pm.member_no FROM project p INNER JOIN project_member pm ON p.project_no = pm.project_no WHERE pm.member_no = #{member_no}

SELECT h.history_content, h.task_no, h.history_register_date, p.project_title, pm.member_no, p.project_no, t.task_title, m.name as name FROM history h INNER JOIN task t ON h.task_no = t.task_no INNER JOIN project_member pm ON t.project_no = pm.project_no INNER JOIN project p ON t.project_no = p.project_no INNER JOIN member m ON t.member_no = m.member_no WHERE pm.member_no = #{member_no} AND p.project_no = #{project_no} ORDER BY h.history_no DESC;

SELECT h.history_content, h.task_no, h.history_register_date, p.project_title, pm.member_no, p.project_no, t.task_title, m.name as name FROM history h INNER JOIN task t ON h.task_no = t.task_no INNER JOIN project_member pm ON t.project_no = pm.project_no INNER JOIN project p ON t.project_no = p.project_no INNER JOIN member m ON t.member_no = m.member_no WHERE pm.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY h.history_no DESC
